name: GoWabi (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of an online beauty service portal intended to assist in booking appointments for spas and massages. The company's portal permits users to find a salon near them and book their appointment accordingly as well as offers cashback on every booking made to redeem for a cash discount, enabling users to search for top service providers of beauty and wellness all over Thailand and book online with discounts.
one_liner: Operator of an online beauty service portal intended to assist in booking appointments for spas and massages. The company's portal permits users to find a salon near them and book their appointment accordingly as well as offers cashback on every booking made to redeem for a cash discount, enabling users to search for top service providers of beauty and wellness all over Thailand and book online with discounts.
